name: League TD
description:
In the game 《League TD》, there are many distinctive defense towers that can be obtained through continuous battles. Having enough materials can unlock higher level defense towers. Each type of defense tower can be continuously upgraded to enhance its attack ability, while unlocking different performance accessories, allowing the defense tower to have different attack skills. A reasonable selection of defense towers with various functional accessories can give your defense front more possibilities.

TOWER


Rich and colorful defense towers, each with its own unique attack method.

Upgrade Defense Tower


Each type of defense tower can be upgraded to level 10, and its performance will improve with the upgrade.
The upgraded defense tower can achieve higher attack power, speed of fire, and longer range.

Defense Tower Accessories


As the level of the defense tower increases, 10 different functional accessories can be unlocked.

Defense Tower Skills


Upgrading different defense tower accessories can result in different skills or performance improvements. There are many types of skills for defense towers, which can be used to build a variety of combinations.

enemy


Rich variety of enemies.
Most enemies have their own means of defense or counterattack.


Are you ready? The enemy won't obediently surrender, let's start fighting together.
